Straight Shot nods thoughtfully.

" That's right.  I wonder if Waspinator w=
ill be willing ta help me out.  Together we might be able ta do something.
=

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 12, 2011, at 12:48 P=
M, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Strai=
ght Shot nods.
> >
> > " That's right, that was in the report. If I can get=
 a fix on who has it I
> > could steal it back for us."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> The=
re was a nod from LEO PRIME, "I don't know." he siad thoughtfully.
> "I tho=
ught Tuscon had tried to forge an alliance with the Predacons.
> Didn't Sco=
urge have it when you left. They may stil have the device."
> 
> LEO grunte=
d as he looked the main viewscreen which still had the
> display of the jun=
gle and the vast area that it covered. "It is
> possible that we may beed t=
heir help in this." It is obvious that that
> admission left an ugly taste =
in LEO's mouth having said that.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston

><br>
> Straight Shot nods.<br>
><br>
> " That's right, that w=
as in the report.   If I can get a fix on who has it I<br>
> could steal=
 it back for us."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
There was a nod from LEO PR=
IME, "I don't know." he siad thoughtfully.<br>
"I thought Tuscon had tried =
to forge an alliance with the Predacons.<br>
Didn't Scourge have it when yo=
u left. They may stil have the device."<br>
<br>
LEO grunted as he looked t=
he main viewscreen which still had the<br>
display of the jungle and the va=
st area that it covered. "It is<br>
possible that we may beed their help in=
 this." It is obvious that that<br>
admission left an ugly taste in LEO's m=
outh having said that.<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
